AttackerCapabilities: Knowledge of SQL login bypass techniques
Ability to use Burp Suite for intercepting and modifying requests

SecurityMeasures: Login page with SQL query for authentication

Steps.Description: The attacker logs in as dennisb@uupeye.edu to the application.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker is trying to gain access to the admin portal.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker logs in using the credentials of dennisb@uupeye.edu.

Steps.Description: The attacker finds a link to the admin portal in the student communication section.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker wants to access the admin portal.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker checks the student communication section and finds a link to the admin portal.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker finds the link to the admin portal.

Steps.Description: The attacker attempts to bruteforce the admin portal but it doesn't work.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker is trying to gain access to the admin portal through brute force.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker attempts to bruteforce the admin portal.

Steps.Description: The attacker tries to bypass the SQL login using Burp Suite.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that the SQL login can be bypassed.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker intercepts the login request using Burp Suite and modifies the SQL query to bypass the login.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully bypasses the SQL login and obtains the link to the admin portal.
